title: (x) & Company - Rage italic {Mark S, Bertjan}
content: There's not much to help ID it with, or even to prove it's not just handwriting. I thought maybe 3 Islands ["Professor"](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124339/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script09Pg3.html) looked similar, but I didn't see anything else, other than maybe Liorah, in Part 9 of the Guide. I didn't have time to check Part 10, but that would be about the only places for the ones I have collected.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: I agree. That's the right 'y', and the right thickness and slant. Looks like I forgot about looking in Part 7 of the Guide, which I where I have Rage Italic :-(
